showScoreExcerpt:
“Director Lila Neugebauer orchestrates the scenes with clockwork precision, setting up the siblings’ individual speeches and breakdowns so that the nearly three-hour production seems to fly by...There’s no escaping our past, Jacobs-Jenkins suggests — and there’s no denying how powerful, and how powerfully entertaining, this play is. “

Read more
